text:
@realDonaldTrump No they called it racist which it was... They didn't say it was early or unnecessary. You banned Chinese nationals from flying and coming into the country but you didn't ban anyone else from flying into the US from China, especially US Citizens...

https://t.co/VZxYmeSV9q
